headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' data: https:; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://fonts.googleapis.com 'strict-dynamic'; style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; frame-src 'self' https://t.me; connect-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data:; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
